alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 12:18PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Adams and southwestern Lincoln Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1217 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Ritzville, or 35 miles east of Moses Lake, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ritzville, Odessa, Harrington, Lamona, Mohler, Marcellus, Batum, Packard, Schoonover, and Jantz. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 202 and 226. U.S. Highway 395 in Washington between mile markers 90 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
